alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 6:53PM CDT until June 20 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rapides Parish in central Louisiana... Northern Evangeline Parish in central Louisiana... Southwestern Avoyelles Parish in central Louisiana... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 653 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lecompte, or 9 miles northwest of Cheneyville, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bunkie, Cheneyville, Turkey Creek, Lecompte, Woodworth and Forest Hill. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 47 and 77. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
